title: Personalized Instructional Design to Strengthen Mathematical Identity in Calculus Courses

context.prior_knowledge: Basic concepts of college-level calculus and teaching experience
context.additional_context: Course for pre-service/in-service teachers to recognize mathematical identity and improve calculus teaching methodologies

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more components of mathematical identity formation.
Apply customized instructional design strategies for calculus course objectives to real-world cases.
Propose methods to enhance mathematical self-efficacy through collaboration with peer teachers.
Analyze learner responses using formative assessment tools in mobile environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
